title.value: Создание исходного материала для селекции пастернака (Pastinaca Sativa L.) в условиях Беларуси
Creation of the initial material for breeding of parsnips (Pastinaca Sativa L.) in the conditions of Belarus

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Bokhan, A.I., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing
Fedorova, M.I., All-Russia Research Inst. of Selection and Seed Growing (Russian Federation)

abstract.value: The article presents the results of parsnips (Pastinaca Sativa L.) initial material studying for breeding for conditions of Belarus. High-yielding parsnip accessions of marketable roots such as Student, All American, Belyi aist, Improved Hollow Grown are identified. There was presented characteristics of the best hybrid combinations parsnip roots by their biochemical composition and the yield of roots. For the first time in the Republic of Belarus there were selected parsnip samples with a high yield of marketable roots Student, All American, Belyi aist, Improved Hollow Grown, which surpassed the standard Luchshij by 12-15%. By intervarietal hybridization of parsnip accessions valuable breeding and hybrid combinations are created: Improved Hollow Grown x Belyi aist, All American x Belyi aist, All American x Student with a yield of commodity roots about 40,4-42,7 t/ha.
